text: Wish you happy every day♡
name: 폴라라라라라 ♡

text: To dear Shoto:

Just fallen for you for a while, but I think you’re so adorable, you talk so gentle and soft since I met you at the first time. Although you always told us to take care ourselves, the people who need to take care themselves the most is you, sometimes I saw you keep coughing on stream, I was really worry about you… I know streaming is your work but I hope you could take good care for yourself, treat yourself some ice-cream more often or in any ways to treat yourself 💜
Happy birthday baby Shoto, I will love you forever 💜
致親愛的Shoto：
我剛喜歡上你沒有多久，但 第一眼看見你時 就覺得你好可愛 講話好溫柔 雖然你常常叫我們take care  ，但在這裡面 最不照顧自己的卻是你，有時看到你在直播的時候一直咳嗽，我真的好心疼...雖然說你是靠直播賺錢，但我還是希望你能夠好好的照顧自己 ，多多帶自己去吃冰淇淋🥰不管甚麼樣的方法都好！💜
生日快樂呀Shoto寶貝🥳，我會一直喜歡你的 🥺💜
name: KC

text: Dear shoto, you are my moon,
Chasing the moon in the dark night, and I am also illuminated by the moonlight.
The tender moon is crumbled into a pinch of stars and melted in your eyes.
love you 💜
亲爱的shoto，你是我的月亮，
在漆黑的夜里追逐月亮，而我也被月光照亮。
温柔的月亮又被揉碎成一撮星星，融化在你的眼里。
爱你💜
name: Akiii

text: Happy birthday to our greatest guild leader! Although I just meet you for a short period of time but you have bring lots of fun in my life, I feel better every time I watch your stream! Hope you can stay happy and able to do what you want to do, we will keep supporting you forever! 💜
祝我們最好的公會會長生日快樂！雖然我認識你不久但你為我的生活帶來了許多快樂，不管何時只要看看你心情就會變好！希望你今後也一直開開心心的，完成你想做的事，我們會一直支持你！💜
name: Namiko

text: You will always be my favorite hello and hardest goodbye. Happy Birthday! My leader.
name: eleanor

text: shoto i wish you have a wonderful year and enjoy your birthday.
name: Bettina

text: Shoto Happy big Birthday. Every time I watch your stream, I will be very happy and it makes all the trobles goes away. Although I don't understand English very well I am still enjoying it very much . I will listen to your songs when I do my homework. You sing so well. It makes me feel relaxed. I hope you can take care of yourself and rest more. I will continue to suppoort you in the future.  POG!.
shoto生日大快樂💜每次看到你的直播都會很開心，讓一整天的煩惱消失~雖然我英文不好聽不太懂😢但是還是看得非常開心。寫作業的時候也都會聽著你的歌回邊聽邊寫，你唱歌真的好好聽~讓人聽了心情放鬆💜希望你能照顧好自己多多休息，今後也會繼續支持你的!加油呢！
name: fei

text: Shoto babe, the first time I met you on tiktok, I was attracted by your sexy voice, only later did I learn that you are a Vtuber then find your twitch channel.
A while ago, I was worrying and panicking with my exams, I didn’t know what to do, but every time when I open up your video, it made me feels calm.

Although we have a language barrier, I can only understand half of the things you said, but I’m still happy for that. Because of you, I want to be a Vtuber, even if there’s only a small chance to be able to talk to you.
Finally, thank you for letting me meet you, hope you have a bright future, I’m just a small fan but I will keep cheering you on!
Shoto寶貝，第一次初遇你的時候是在tiktok上面，我被你性感的聲音所吸引，之後才知道原來你是ㄧ位Vtuber ，並找到你的twitch 。
在一陣子前，我面臨高中的大考，我當時非常的緊張，感到恐慌，不知如何是好，不過當我打開你的影片，我就會感到平靜。
雖然我們的語言不通，我只能聽懂一半，但我還是非常開心，因為你，我未來甚至想要成為一位Vtuber，即使只有微小的機會能夠跟你講上一句話。
最後，謝謝你讓我遇到你，希望你的未來一片光明，請繼續努力，我雖然只是一個小小的粉絲，但我會不斷為你加油的！
name: Shoto’s tail

text: Thank you for appearing in my life, all my depressed mood always be swept away whenever I see your smile, you must not know your smile can save my whole world. From the world prosperity to desolation, you are my faith and I will always be your fan.
感謝你出現在我的生命中，每當看到你笑鬱悶的心情總能一掃而空，你一定不知道你的笑容可以拯救我的全世界。
世界從繁華到荒蕪，你依舊是我的信仰，我永遠是你的粉絲。
name: 玥晞

text: Our greatest guild leader! Happy birthday~~~

I’m so nervous, this is my first time to celebrate your birthday, although I it hasn't been long since I fell in love with you, but from the day I met you, I’ve been completely attracted to you. Not only your wonderful voice when you sing, also because of your warmth, positivity and kindness. I’m so glad my friend recommended your stream to me, you are the one who shines in my eyes, you give me the motivation to face all the bad things, even made me feel a lot better every time I feel upset, just because I heard your voice. It seems to be too dependent on you, but these are really my daily life. Thank you for all the joy you bring me, happy birthday my baby. Good luck for you Vtuber life and hope you keep being healthy and safe, the most importantly, hope you will be happy every day. I will always support you no matter when and where you are. I love you💜
偉大的公會會長!生日快樂～～～
第一次幫你過生日真的好緊張
雖然喜歡上你的時間沒有很久
但自從我認識你的那天開始
我就已經完完全全的被你吸引
不僅僅是因為你唱歌時的美妙聲音
更是因為你的溫暖、正面、善良
我很謝謝我的朋友向我推薦了你
一個在我的眼裡就是閃閃發光的你
你讓我有了更大的動力去面對所有的不順遂
甚至我能馬上從不開心到開心
都僅僅是因為聽到你的聲音
這樣講好像顯得過於依賴你了w
不過這真的是我的日常
謝謝你給我帶來了這麼多的歡樂
生日快樂我的寶貝
希望你能夠在V這條路上越來越順遂
然後身體健康 平平安安
最重要的一點是 希望你能夠天天開心
然後不論在何時何地我都會永遠支持你
我愛你💜
name: Yan

text: Your stream accompanied me through the painful exams, I will listen to your voice whenever I feel tried, it makes me relax and give me the motivation to keep studying, thank you Shoto!!!💜💜💜
你的直播陪我度過最難熬的考試，每次很累時都會來聽聽你的聲音，會感覺很放鬆，有動力繼續讀書，謝謝Shoto的陪伴！！💜💜💜
name: Sarah

text: Hi Shoto~~ Happy Birthday to our cutest guild leader! \( ˙▿˙ )/ Since the first time I saw your stream clip on YouTube, the thing I look forward to every day is watching your stream. Your streams are the source of warmth, which not only cured my stress of the day but also brought me joy every time and let me get into the love of horror games. I love this community so much. You deserve the world and all the happiness. Happy birthday and I hope you have a wonderful year!!! 💜💜🗡
٩( ᐖ )وYOU ARE THE BEST٩( ᐖ )و
name: Yuzu Chen

text: Happy birthday Shoto! I hope u everything goes well.luv u(◍•ᴗ•◍)❤
name: Amanda Lin

text: Hey Shou!! Happy birthday to you~~🎵 Thank you for always giving us a lot of love. Today is your birthday, hope you have fun!! If you're working hard, just think about your guildies! Hope to think that we can successfully give you strength💜💜
Thank you asmr for accompanying me every night, allowing me to sleep peacefully.
I wish you a wonderful birthday memory. Wo ai ni!!
name: FUU

text: Happy birthday shoto!!! Congratulations on another year older. Hope you will be happy and healthy every day in the future don’t overwork yourself! Remember to let yourself rest. Lastly, I want to thank you, because of you my life are more colorful and makes me much happier than before. Thank you! I love you!
Happy birthday shoto!!!
恭喜你又長大了一歲~~
希望你在未來的日子裡能每天開開心心、健健康康的過每一天，不要讓自己太累喔！記得讓自己休息
最後我想要謝謝你，因為有你我的生活多了一些色彩，讓我比以往開心了很多。謝謝你！我愛你
name: xing

text: Happy birthday shoto! Nice to meet you and will always love you.💜 I hope you are always happy. I love you!💜💜💜
name: Moon moon

text: Happy birthday Shoto💜 Thank you so much for being in my life and always bringing us joy! I'm so glad I got to meet you, you try your best to bring us the best in every stream, you're really great! I love your wonderful voice from your karaoke stream, your soft voice when you playing RPG games and your BOTTOM scream in horror games. I also love how you always gentle in reminding people or informing them of important things and rules, you are a very principled person. You also stand up for your friends and comfort them, which is really warm 💜 Don't forget you're not alone. If you get hurt or upset, remember you still got us! We will always support you whenever you need it and be your support. You are the best and we are proud of you, out guild leader 💜 Happy birthday again 💜 Hope you will always be happy and be the sun shine in our hearts 💜  💜  💜
生日快樂Shoto💜
很感謝你出現在我的生命裡，總是帶給我們歡樂!
我很高興能夠遇見你，在每場直播裡都盡力帶給我們最好的觀賞，你真的很棒!
我喜歡你歌回裡美好的歌聲、RPG裡的溫柔嗓音以及恐怖遊戲中的BOTTOM尖叫聲等等。
也喜歡你總是很溫柔的提醒大家或者告知大家重要事項及規範，是個很有原則的人。
你也常常替朋友挺身而出、安慰他們，真的很溫暖💜
別忘了你不是一個人，如果傷心、難過了，要記得 你還有我們!
我們會在你最需要的時刻支持你，做你永遠的後盾。
你是最棒的，是讓我們最為驕傲的公會會長💜
最後再次祝你生日快樂💜
希望你永遠開心快樂，做我們心中的小太陽💜💜💜
name: Kimi

text: Happy Birthday to our cutest guild leader. We love you.
祝我們最可愛的公會會長生日快樂！
我們愛你💜
name: Yen

text: Hi shoto, HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!! You are literally  a cute demon slayer, hope you can be happy through all your stream life. You gave me a strong power to get through all the hard times, so if you have any problems, your guildies will get through it with you toooooo. Love you💜💜
name: yxina

text: Happy birthday to our dearest guild leader 💜 No matter when and where you are, the Guildies are always here to support you 💜 Thank you for just purely existing and giving me so much mental support and relieves during my hard times, you will never know how wonderful you are to us, and you deserve everything (and I mean EVERYTHING) so don’t question yourself, just do what you like! We all were part of a star that got split but you must be the piece that came from the most precious part of the star and shine on us, thank you 🌟💜
name: Squid

text: First of all! Happy birthday to the most lovely Shoto in the world, Sho babe, you are both good at singing and playing games which make people love you more when they watch your stream, thank you for always bringing us joy on stream, very lucky to meet you when I first starting to watch Vtubers, you let me start to know more and get in love to Vtubers, which also added some color to my life, hope Shoto in the future will be even better, and more fans who love you, we will always be by your side Sho babe❤️
首先！祝世界上最最最可愛的shoto生日快樂🥳不管是唱歌還是打遊戲都很拿手的sho寶真的會讓人越看越喜歡，謝謝你總是在直播裡帶給我們歡笑，很慶幸入v坑時遇見的是你，你讓我開始認識並且喜歡上了v，也為我的生活增添了一些色彩，希望未來的shoto可以更好，擁有更多愛你的粉絲，sho寶我們會一直陪在你身邊的❤️
name: yeechia

text: I first met you in February, although the time I spent with you wasn’t that long, but my love for you keeps growing more and more. May you have a bright future, won’t bound by others and be your true self! HAPPY BIRTHDAY! MY BOY SHOTO.You're my treasure.
从今年二月认识你到现在，虽然陪伴你的时间短暂，但对你的爱只增不减。愿你前程似锦，不受外界束缚，做真正的自己!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY! MY  BOY SHOTO.You're my treasure.
name: soffyanni

text: Hey! Although I never send any SC nor make a lot of blessing, I am still you fan. I will get to know you more. May all your dreams and wishes come true one day. Be yourself, you can do it.
嘿 即時我沒有送過SC 沒有做出很多的祝福 我依然是你的粉絲 我會慢慢了解你 希望有一天你能完成你的夢想 你的願望 做你自己 你可以的
name: 貓子

text: Dear Guild Leader Shoto Happy Bithday! I love you so much. You voice always make me relaxed and cheer me up. Whenever I have a bad mood, I will listen to your song. Close to you and promise of the world are really nice! I hope you can continue to do what you want. Please don't be too hard on yourself. No matter what the future holds, I want you to be happy. We will support you forever.
親愛的會長Shoto   生日快樂！
我真的好愛好愛你，你的聲音總是讓我很放鬆且充滿力量！每當我心情不好時總會聽你唱的close to you 和promise of the world ，真的很好聽！
希望你能持續做你想做的事，也請不要對自己太嚴苛，無論將來如何，希望你能保持開心！我們永遠都會是你的後盾！
name: StarShiny

text: Cutest Shoto Babe, Today marks the most special day of the year when you were born.. Happy Birthday. Wishing you good health and happiness from now on. Accompany you to grow, wataching your stream fills me with joy and healing. Thank you for cheering me up every day. Love you Love you.
可愛的shoto寶，今天是一年之中最特別的日子就是出生在這世界上的誕生日，祝你HAPPY BITHDAY以後的時光都能幸福快樂健健康康的，陪伴著你一起成長。看著你的直播覺得倍感歡樂且療癒，謝謝你帶給我滿滿的元氣度過每一天。愛你愛你
name: milk醬

text: Happy Birthday! Shoto 💜 To our cutest guild leader: I am a person often feel down in the dumps. Until I found out your stream, I think watiching your stream is my happiest time. You are always postitive and happy (also sussy🤣). You may think I am exaggerated, but I think you are very gentle and able to heal others. I wish you happy every day! <3  Guild member Shung
生日快樂!shoto💜
給可愛的會長shoto：
我是一個很常陷入低潮的人，直到看了你的直播，我覺得我最快樂的時候是在看你的直播，總是很正向歡樂（及sussy🤣），雖然你可能會覺得沒有那麼誇張，但我覺得在我眼裡你就是一個溫柔能治癒他人的人。
祝你每一天都快樂！＜3
工會成員 shung 🗡
name: shung

text: ( I can't speak English fluently, but I will try my best! )
To our beloved precious top alpha manly dominant sigma infertile but also bottom guild leader:
We, guildies might have changed your life a lot, but you also changed ours in a wonderful way.

I had hard times expressing myself, often upset, but I derived so much joy from your streams, impressed with the way you express love to people you care about and those encouraging messages you convey. I want to be a warm person just like you.
Thank you for existing, spreading love, happiness to countless people. You are priceless treasure to us. If there's one thing more beautiful than your cute face, that must be your heart.
Best birthday wishes for the best boy in the world!
name: SagoOishii

text: Happy Birthday Babe! Hope you happy every day.
生日快乐宝贝！希望你每天都开心！
name: Miaomiao

text: Hiiiiiii! Babe! Congratulations on your birthday! Although I haven’t known you for long, but from the first I saw you , I was attracted to you, you’re so lovely, sincere and cheerful. Not matter where you are, I’m only a screen away from you; no matter where you are, you are always inscribed in my heart, I will always wish you from afar! Thank you for bringing me happiness
hiiiiiii！寶！非常恭喜你生日！雖然沒有入坑很久，但看到的第一眼，就被你吸引住了，你的可愛、真誠、活潑開朗，ㄧ切是如此的吸引我🥰🥰無論你在何處，我與你只有一個螢屏的距離；無論我在何時，我都會銘刻你在心裡，我永遠在遠方祝福你！謝謝你帶給我快樂🥰
name: liboangel

text: Happy birthday shoto!!!!💜🔪It’s my first year spending birthday with you and I’m so grateful about it! Thankyou for always bringing us fun contents and being yourself and maybe have huge tolerance on some of our dumb acts haahahah💜🗡💜🗡 I might not be those who were here on day one, but throughout this whole year I’ve watched the whole community to grow and its because of you, I started knowing more about the vtuber community. (Also you might have made more people liking dogs, I’m one of those ha!) You and the boys maybe the generation that bring the vtuber community to light and spreads it 🫶🏻🫶🏻 Please keeping doing what you like, and we will be supporting all along 💜🫶🏻 Have the best one shouuuuu💜🫶🏻💜🫶🏻💜🫶🏻🗡🗡🗡🗡
name: Joomaaa

text: Hi Shoto, It's a pleasure to celebrate this special day with you. I am very happy to be part of your adventure journey. After a busy working day, I am healed by happily watching your stream and listening to your voice. You are like a summer breeze, always blows away my fatigue from the day. Cheer me up so that I can continue to face the challenges of tomorrow. Thank you for being in this world, it is so lucky to meet you in this wide world. Shoto Happy Birthday, I wish you stay safe, healthy and happy.
Hi Shoto, 很開心能和你一起慶祝這個特別的日子，也很開心能參與你的冒險旅程，和你一起冒險。每天忙了一天回到家，看到你的直播、聽到你的聲音，都會覺得很療癒、很開心。你就像夏日的微風，總是能吹散我一整天的疲勞，讓我打起精神繼續面對明天的挑戰。
謝謝你出現在這個世界上，很幸運能在這個廣大的世界上與你相遇。
Shoto 生日快樂，願你過得平安健康、開心順利。
name: Hitomi

text: love u love u, Shoto，happy birthday<3！！
name: 理理子

text: Thank you for meeting you, I got a new job recently and encountered lots of annoying things in this new challenges. Thanks to your video and streams, I felt relaxed and immersed in your voice and in the stream, it was very comfortable and makes me feel much better, thank you very much for knowing you!
感謝遇見你，最近的我剛好換了新工作，在新的挑戰中遇到蠻多讓人煩躁的事情，多虧看到了你的影片跟直播，我覺得非常的放鬆，跟沉浸在你的聲音還有整個直播很舒服的感覺，讓我心情好了很多，非常感謝認識你！

text: HAPPY BIRTHDAY SHOTO！You are the treasure I found in the world, I will always love you!💜

text: Happy birthday Shoto, although I met you relatively late, but since I met you, I have a great time every day. You are like a beam of light, I also want to be a light like you, I will work hard , Shoto you got this (❁´◡`❁)*✲ﾟ*
shoto生日快乐，虽然认识你的时间比较晚，但从认识你开始，我每天都很开心快乐，你就像一束光，我也想成为像你一样的光，我会努力的，shoto也要加油呀(❁´◡`❁)*✲ﾟ*

text: Our Guild Leader, I am very happy that you show me the difference of the world. I like to see everything you do. I am so proud of you. Happy Birthday. Love you 😘
我的公會會長，很開心你讓看到這不同的世界，喜歡看你做的每件事，為你感到驕傲，生日快樂，愛你😘

text: Thank you for showing up in my life and lighting me up. Because of Shoto, I want to be a better version of myself. Wish you good health and happiness! Happy Birthday Shoto!

text: Hi Shoto, on this day, a very special guild leader came into this world and I'm forever grateful~ Wishing nothing but love and happiness on your special day. Happy birthday!
name: Iuan

text: Happy Birthday to Shoto💜. Thank you for your wonderful stream. It adds a lot of fun to my boring life. I am so happy to see your channel growing step by step! Looking forward to more adventures in the future!
Happy Birthday to Shoto💜
謝謝你美好的直播~
使我平凡無趣的生活增添了不少樂趣(/ω＼)
看著Shoto頻道循序漸進的成長真的很開心！
期待未來更多的冒險！
name: cceden00121

text: Shoto Happy Birthday!! Wish you have a nice day!
Shoto祝你生日快樂!!!希望你有個快樂的一天!!!

text: bae HBD ！！！ May you healthy and happy all the time ！！May all good things be around you！love u and I'm going to study my English harder to better communicate with u！
name: Ziyuaaa_

text: Happy Birthday Shoto baby!!! I’m glad I met you this year, although I missed a lot of things before, but I will love you more and more. Thank you for all the happiness and warmth you bring to me, you give me motivation during the low times of my life, hope you can always be happy
Shoto寶貝生日快樂!!!很高興在今年遇到你，雖然錯過了之前的好多東西，但我會越來越愛你的。謝謝你帶給我好多快樂跟溫暖，在我人生低潮的時候給我動力，祝你能永遠開心。
name: Momo摸摸

text: Happy birthday to the cutest Shotop in the world!!! Thank you for your appear, bring a little sweet to this bitter world, giving a little more light to the darkness of me, please guide me in the future😊😊😊😊💜💜💜💜😘😘😘
世界上最可愛的Shotop生日快樂！！！
謝謝你的出現，給這個苦不堪言的世界多了一絲甜，讓處在黑暗的我，多了一絲光亮，未來還請多多指教😊😊😊😊💜💜💜💜😘😘😘
name: Okidoki

text: Happy birthday Shoto! May you will be filled with joy in this special day. Although I haven’t known you for long, but I enjoy your stream, even though I can only understand some of the things you said, I feel relaxed when I hear you voice. Wish you have all the joy in the year, and everything you meet can give you the passion to go forward
Shoto生日快樂!願這特殊的日子裡，你的每時每刻都充滿歡樂，雖然認識你的時間不長，但我很喜歡你的直播，雖然只聽得懂一些，可是聽到你的聲音就會覺得放鬆，祝你歲歲常歡愉年年皆勝意，從今往後遇到的一切能給你嚮往熱愛的力量!
name: 夜里的一束光

text: Happy Birthday Shoto! You will always be my favourite streamer. Love you forever.
Wishing you always be healthy and happy.  To do what you wan t to do. We will be always supporting you.
生日快樂SHOTO!!!!!你永遠是我最喜歡的直播主
永遠愛你
希望你能一直健康快樂 做自己想做的事 我們會永遠在你身後支持你:)
name: Bei

text: Dear Shoto, I am very happy to meet you this year. I look forward to your stream every time. I like your heart healing voices, and I also like the way you have been working hard on your career. I will contunue to support you. I hope to see you achieving your goals with all the guildies next year. I also wish you have a fantastic birthday with your friends. Happy Birthday to our guild leader.
給Shoto
很開心能在今年認識你，每次都很期待你的直播，很喜歡你治癒人心的聲音，也喜歡著你一直都在事業上努力的樣子。
今後也會繼續支持你的，希望到明年的時候能跟公會裡的大家一起看著你的目標實現，也祝福你能跟夥伴們一起度過美好的生日。生日快樂，會長。
name: Haruru

text: Thank you Shoto for brinng me joy and happiness, cheering me up and giving me comforting words when I am down. Your voice make me calm and feel peacful.When I am plain bored working in my office, I don't know what to think.  I always think of your game play, Sometimes it makes me laugh and these thoughts had sustained m e throughout the four month working period, and then returned to college life.

I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart for what you have done for the guildies. We chat and having fun together. I found somewhere I belong. Also, you inspired me to do something I have never done before. Such as trying to clip your vods, try to draw, try to sing YOASOBI's <<Monster>> without reading the lyrics. I also tried the first pancake of my life. It's yummy. 😋 You are my motivation of learning language. After I start to watch your stream, I found that my listening has improved a lot. I get used to different Englisg accents. I started to learn English for everyday life. I signed up online English classes with native speaker. I learn to use urban dictionary to search memes and some sussy words that you have mentioned LMAO. And I am used to read Twitter in English. After you start studying Japanese on Duolingo, I'm picking up on my Japanese learning progress on Duolingo because I don't want to be chased by you hahaha 🤣

By the way, Shoto's sing is getting better and better. I'm very proud of you! Although these may not sounds like blessings, When you feel tired, I hope my words can be yout motivation, never forget why you started, keep accompany guildies in adventure. ☺️Last but not least,happy birthday,Shoto!🥳 As long as you are happy,I am happy! And I love you 💜 *mwuah*
謝謝Shoto 在我心情低落的時候給我歡笑、給我加油打氣、給我安慰的話語，你的聲音是我的定心劑，能夠讓我心情變得平穩。在我度過漫長又無趣的上班時間時，不知道要想什麼的時候，我常常想到你在遊戲中的各種片段，有時想一想還會笑出來，我又覺得我可以繼續撐過這段為期四個月痛苦的上班日子，然後回歸到大學生活。
我由衷感謝（from bottom of my heart)你為我們guildies 所帶來的一切。因為你，我們聚在一起聊天、一起玩（having fun together)讓我有了歸屬感。此外，也激發（inspire)我去我從來沒有做過的事情，像是試著剪影片、試著畫畫、試著不看歌詞唱完YOASOBI 的《怪物》。我也吃到我人生中第一個pancakes ，很好吃😋

Shoto 也是我繼續精進我的學語言的動力！看了你的直播後，我發現我的英文聽力進步很多，也慢慢適應聽各種口音的英文。我開始學習生活化的英文，上道地口說的線上課程。慢慢懂得如何用urban dictionary 查詢一些網路用語和你會提到的一些sussy 單字LMAO ，也習慣看全英文的Twitter 了！看到你在Duolingo 學習日語，我重拾我在Duolingo 學習日語的進度，因為我不想要被你追過去哈哈哈🤣

對了，Shoto 唱歌越來越好聽，I’m very proud of you! 雖然這一些不太像是祝福話，但希望我的感謝可以讓你直播累的時候，看了變得更有動力、重拾初衷，繼續帶著我們guildies 一起旅行☺️Last but not least,happy birthday,Shoto!🥳 As long as you are happy,I am happy! And I love you 💜 *mwuah*
name: Carolin00000

text: Happy Birthday Shoto. You are the first vtuber I started to follow seriously. I had a  wonderful time since I met you last six months. I hope I have the opportunity to celebrate your birthday again in the next  few years. Once again Happy Birthday Shoto.
生日快樂Shoto
你是我第一個讓我開始認真追v的v
在認識你後的這半年都讓我非常開心
希望接下來的幾年還有機會再慶祝會長的生日
再一次 生日快樂Shoto!
name: Shimasen

text: At first, I just thought your voice was nice, but after getting to know you gradually, I found that your heart is so soft. You are very kind to your friends, and also kind to us. You are a warm and lovely boy.
I'm so glad to have such a great guild leader. Because of you, I met a lot of adorable guildies. I am happy every day!
Thank you for being with us. Hope you get better and better!🥰
Happy birthday Shoto💜
name: Lynn10

text: Thank you Shoto for bringing me a lot of joyful moments. No matter you are shotop or shottom I am still like you (lmao). I will be continue to support you. Wishing you happy and healthy.
謝謝shoto帶給我很多開心和放鬆的時光 無論shotop 或 shottom我都很喜歡（lmao) 會繼續支持你！希望你要開心和健康！
name: Daiting

text: Happy Birthday Shoto. Whenever I feel lost and insercured, watching your stream made me feel better. Although it doesn't solve the problems, it can give me a short rest. You are my rest stop , so that I can rectify myself and move forward again.  I hope you can do everthing you want . We've got your back. Thank you Shoto for all the happiness and rest you bought me. Thank you
生日快樂 shoto 🎉🎉
在我感到迷茫、不安時，看你的直播又讓我重新打起精神，雖然解決不了問題 但也讓我短暫的休息，你是我的休息站 讓我可以整頓然後再次向前
希望你能做到你所想要的一切 我們大家會一直作為你的後盾存在的 謝謝你shoto給我帶來的所有快樂與休息 謝謝✧٩(ˊωˋ*)و✧
name: 𝐓𝐢𝐧𝐠

text: hiiii shoto! There is a Chinese word called "一见倾心" which means love at first sight. I had the same feeling when I met you. Happy Birthday Shoto. I am really really really happy to meet you. May your birthday and every day be filled with happiness🥰I love you.
hiiii shoto! 中文有个词叫做"一见倾心"，我想我遇到shoto也是如此！祝shoto生日快乐！真的真的真的 很高兴认识你！希望新的一岁你也能开开心心每一天🥰我爱你
name: 三森ouo

text: Thank you for giving me so much joy. Hope you can be better and better.
name: shangchi

text: Happy Birthday Shoto!!!
I’m glad I could celebrate with you, although I just met you but hope I can be with you for a long time! Hope you can always do what you like, play with your friends and be happy every day💜
Happy Birthday Shoto!!!
很開心可以幫你慶生，雖然剛認識你不久，但希望以後可以陪你很久很久！
希望你可以一直做自己喜歡的事、跟朋友們一起玩，每天都要開開心心的唷💜
name: Kelly_717

text: Hi Shoto! Happy birthday to you🥳💜

First time I saw you was when I'm in quarantine at home because of Covid. I felt so ill and couldn't do anything but watching YT. Thanks to YouTube for recommending this cute, kind and warm boy to me. This boy just made me feel so much better and forget the pain of the  Covid.

I really enjoy watching your stream. Your voice and the way you talk can make people feel relaxed and comfortable. (not when you're sus tho🤣) I'm glad to know you, a very outstanding and interesting Vtuber. I'll keep watching your stream and supporting our guild leader🥰
btw your music preference is so similar to many of us. So if you didn't hear it before, I hope you can listen to Woosung's songs, especially the song Face. His songs are so amazing :)
Happy birthday to you🥳  Stay healthy and happy 💜
name: PaiJi

text: Hi Shoto, I’m a fan who get in love with you recently, thank you for all the happiness you bring me through stream, hope you can be a happy puppy forever. Happy Birthday♡♡
嗨嗨shoto，我是最近才喜歡上你的新粉絲，謝謝你在直播中帶給我的歡樂，
希望你可以一直做一隻快樂的小狗狗。生日快樂 ♡♡
name: ga
